title: Ability to manage snapshots in WP emulator
body: The Windows Phone emulator should include the ability to manage VM snapshots for Windows Phone images. Developers should be able to create WP images that are tailored to be in a specific state, and manage those image snapshots.

comments.body: Yes, this would be useful so you don't have to switch from US to local culture and reboot the phone before starting.
Added this after a developer conversation this week
